= Introduction =

When I started to develope code using JMS, it was a new technology for me. I started with the first Hello World of ACTIVEMQ-CPP and I thought that it was an very upper level API, that allows you to distribute your content in a easy way. And it's true.
<p>
If you are thinking in only one producer and one consumer that sends/receive messages probably you are thinking that you dont need to use this wrapper, and its probably true. But there are some goals that this wrapper do for you.
